source.sqlReaderQuery:
/****** Script for SelectTopNRows command from SSMS  ******/
SELECT  [ITEM_NUMBER]
      ,[DESCRIPTION]
      ,[DESCRIPTION_ESA]
      ,[ORANIZATION_CODE]
      ,[TEMPLATE_NAME]
      ,[LIST_PRICE_PER_UNIT]
      ,[UOM_CODE]
      ,[WEIGHT_UOM_CODE]
      ,[UNIT_WEIGHT]
      ,[VOLUME_UOM_CODE]
      ,[UNIT_VOLUME]
      ,[MIN_MINMAX_QUANTITY]
      ,[MAX_MINMAX_QUANTITY]
      ,[FULL_LEAD_TIME]
      ,[FIXED_LOT_MULTIPLIER]
      ,[FIXED_ORDER_QUANTITY]
      ,[MINIMUM_ORDER_QUANTITY]
      ,[MAXIMUM_ORDER_QUANTITY]
      ,[LONG_DESCRIPTION]
      ,[ITEM_INV_APPLICATION]
      ,[TRANSACTION_CONDITION_CODE]
      ,[ADJUSTMENT_ACCOUNT]
      ,[CORRECTION_ACCOUNT]
      ,[SALES_COST_ACCOUNT]
      ,[FOUR_DIGIT_CODE]
      ,[ORG_NAME]
      ,[PE_EXT_ATTRIBUTE1]
      ,[PE_EXT_ATTRIBUTE2]
  FROM [inventory].[Parts_Item_Header]

preCopyScript.value:
--pre copy script for sink
TRUNCATE TABLE @{pipeline().parameters.stgTableName}

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
QUOTENAME(table_Schema) + '.' + QUOTENAME(TABLE_NAME) AS Table_Name, TABLE_CATALOG
   FROM information_Schema.tables
   WHERE TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE'
